item.description:
Hi, I'm hosting a Thanksliving day dinner for all of those that either don't have a place to go, want to avoid the family holiday dramas or who would rather have a cruelty free day with friends to truly show their thanks. This will be a potluck style meal and is open to everyone.

I created a space on the message board so that everyone can let me know what they want to bring. We don't want 15 mashed potatoes showing up! :)
item.name: Vegan Thanksliving potluck
